metadata.name: skill-creator
metadata.description: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.

metadata.name: spec-skill
metadata.description: This skill should be used when creating, managing, or working with structured specifications (specs) following a three-phase workflow: Requirements → Design → Implementation. It includes steering for project conventions and command-based hooks for automation.
